title: annex init fails on Windows
body:
In more than one test ~~~(possibly all of them automagicio-related)~~~ -- example:
```
[00:15:30] ======================================================================
[00:15:30] ERROR: datalad.tests.test_auto.test_proxying_io_open_regular(<function test_proxying_io_open_regular.<locals>.generate_dat at 0x05B536A8>, <function test_proxying_io_open_regular.<locals>.verify_dat at 0x05B536F0>)
[00:15:30] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[00:15:30] Traceback (most recent call last):
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
[00:15:30]     self.test(*self.arg)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 669, in newfunc
[00:15:30]     return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\contextlib.py", line 77, in __exit__
[00:15:30]     self.gen.throw(type, value, traceback)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\utils.py", line 1341, in make_tempfile
[00:15:30]     yield filename
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 669, in newfunc
[00:15:30]     return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\test_auto.py", line 117, in _test_proxying_open
[00:15:30]     annex2 = AnnexRepo.clone(repo, repo2)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\gitrepo.py", line 739, in clone
[00:15:30]     gr = cls(path, *args, repo=repo, **kwargs)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\repo.py", line 146, in __call__
[00:15:30]     instance = type.__call__(cls, *new_args, **new_kwargs)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 229, in __init__
[00:15:30]     self._init(version=version, description=description)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 1256, in _init
[00:15:30]     self._run_annex_command('init', annex_options=opts)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 1053, in _run_annex_command
[00:15:30]     raise e
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 1045, in _run_annex_command
[00:15:30]     return self.cmd_call_wrapper.run(cmd_list, env=env, **kwargs)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\cmd.py", line 670, in run
[00:15:30]     cmd, env=self.get_git_environ_adjusted(env), *args, **kwargs)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\cmd.py", line 530, in run
[00:15:30]     raise CommandError(str(cmd), msg, status, out[0], out[1])
[00:15:30] datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: command '['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'init']' failed with exitcode 1
[00:15:30] Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'init'] under 'C:\\Users\\appveyor\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\1\\datalad_temp_95ef7tvl_2'. Exit code=1. out=init  

[00:15:30] 

[00:15:30] 

[00:15:30] (merging origin/git-annex into git-annex...)

[00:15:30] (recording state in git...)

[00:15:30] 

[00:15:30] 

[00:15:30] failed

[00:15:30]  err=  Detected a filesystem without fifo support.

[00:15:30]   Disabling ssh connection caching.

[00:15:30]   Detected a crippled filesystem.

[00:15:30]   Enabling direct mode.

[00:15:30] git-annex: .git\annex\objects\5b7\d0f\SHA256E-s3--a665a45920422f9d417e4867efdc4fb8a04a1f3fff1fa07e998e86f7f7a27ae3\: openTempFile: does not exist (No such file or directory)

[00:15:30] git-annex: init: 1 failed
```
